title: Automate Competitor Research with Exa.ai, Notion and AI Agents
author: Jimleuk
readme:
This n8n workflow demonstrates a simple multi-agent setup to perform the task of competitor research. It showcases how using the HTTP request tool could reduce the number of nodes needed to achieve a workflow like this.

## How it works

  * For this template, a source company is defined by the user which is sent to [Exa.ai](http://Exa.ai) to find competitors.
  * Each competitor is then funnelled through 3 AI agents that will go out onto the internet and retrieve specific datapoints about the competitor; company overview, product offering and customer reviews.
  * Once the agents are finished, the results are compiled into a report which is then inserted in a notion database.



Check out an example output here: [https://jimleuk.notion.site/2d1c3c726e8e42f3aecec6338fd24333?v=de020fa196f34cdeb676daaeae44e110&pvs=4](https://jimleuk.notion.site/2d1c3c726e8e42f3aecec6338fd24333?v=de020fa196f34cdeb676daaeae44e110&pvs=4)

## Requirements

  * An OpenAI account for the LLM.
  * [Exa.ai](http://Exa.ai) account for access to their AI search engine.
  * SerpAPI account for Google search.
  * Firecrawl.dev account for webscraping.
  * [Notion.com](http://Notion.com) account for database to save final reports.



## Customising the workflow

Add additional agents to gather more datapoints such as SEO keywords and metrics.

Not using notion? Feel free to swap this out for your own database.

readme_zh:
此n8n工作流展示了一个简单的多智能体设置，用于执行竞争对手研究任务。它演示了如何利用HTTP请求工具减少实现此类工作流所需的节点数量。

## 工作原理

* 用户定义一家源公司，该信息将被发送至[Exa.ai](http://Exa.ai)以查找竞争对手
* 每个竞争对手会经由3个AI智能体处理，这些智能体会在互联网上检索关于该竞争对手的具体数据点：公司概况、产品供应和客户评价
* 智能体完成任务后，结果会被汇编成报告并插入Notion数据库

查看示例输出：[此处](https://jimleuk.notion.site/2d1c3c726e8e42f3aecec6338fd24333?v=de020fa196f34cdeb676daaeae44e110&pvs=4)

## 需求条件

* OpenAI账户（用于大语言模型）
* [Exa.ai](http://Exa.ai)账户（访问其AI搜索引擎）
* SerpAPI账户（用于谷歌搜索）
* Firecrawl.dev账户（用于网络爬取）
* [Notion.com](http://Notion.com)账户（存储最终报告的数据库）

## 自定义工作流

可添加更多智能体来收集其他数据点，如SEO关键词和指标。若不使用Notion，可自由替换为您自己的数据库系统。
title_zh: 利用Exa.ai、Notion和AI代理自动化竞争对手研究
